author: rgreenberg77
title: Worth the Wait
text:
We discovered the Library Hotel years ago while we were staying at the Hyatt Grand Central. We decided that on some future trip we'd stay at The Library Hotel and finally did it while celebrating our 27th anniversary. It took us over ten years to stay there but it was worth the wait. We'll be back. The room was excellent, especially the bathroom. Each room is themed and we had "Travel Book," next to the "Asian History" room. Our room had shelved covered with travel books. The bed was extra comfortable and the tv set was of good size.
The 24 hour lounge with snacks and coffee, the evening wine and cheese hours, the morning continental breakfast were all great.
Above all, the staff at The Library Hotel went out of their way to be helpful. They knew us by name almost immediately and volunteered help at every opportunity. It's a great crew!
Room Tip: If you love books, see if you can get a room with a theme of interest to you. See more room tips
